title: Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the
heading: 2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid19) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) is 
amended by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “21st day of October 2021” 
for “9th day of October 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [513] 3

title: Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
provide that the regulations shall remain in operation until the 21st October
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation amend health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 2) regulation 2021 (s.i no 217 2021) provide regulation shall remain operation 21st october
